text: Ezɨ Moses Ikiavɨra Itir God mɨgɨa ghaze, “Markɨ, Ekiam. Nɨ na amangan markɨ. Kɨ fomɨra iza datɨrɨghɨn deragha bizibav geir puvatɨ. Ezɨ nɨ datɨrɨghɨn na mɨgeima, kɨ bizibav geir gumazimɨn mɨn otozir puvatɨ. Kɨ asoghosogha bizibav gɨa, egha uaghan nɨmɨra bizibav gei. Egha kɨ mɨkɨmamin nɨghnɨzitam zuamɨra a ginɨrɨghan kogham.”
